name: Baby Care Service
description: Professional and loving care for your little ones. Our experienced caregivers provide comprehensive baby care including feeding, diaper changing, playtime activities, sleep monitoring, and ensuring your baby's safety and comfort at all times. We understand that your baby deserves the best care, and we're here to provide peace of mind while you're away.
shortDescription: Professional baby care with experienced caregivers for your little ones' safety and happiness.

name: Elderly Care Service
description: Compassionate and professional care for senior citizens. Our trained caregivers assist with daily activities, medication reminders, mobility support, companionship, and ensure the well-being and dignity of your elderly loved ones. We provide personalized care that respects independence while offering the support needed for a comfortable and safe life.
shortDescription: Compassionate elderly care with trained professionals for your senior family members' well-being.

name: Sick People Care Service
description: Specialized care for individuals recovering from illness or managing chronic conditions. Our skilled caregivers provide medical monitoring, personal hygiene assistance, meal support, medication administration, and emotional comfort. We ensure your loved ones receive the attention and care they need during challenging times.
shortDescription: Specialized care for sick individuals with skilled caregivers for recovery and comfort.
features: Health monitoring and vital signs check
